tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE accommodations (
  accommodation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  accommodation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  accommodation_description TEXT,
  accommodation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Accommodations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  accommodation_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Modifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  modification_type VARCHAR(50),
  details TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE student_modifications (
  modification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  modification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  modification_description TEXT,
  date_modified DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id INT NOT NULL,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    modification_id INT,
    history_date DATE
);
